data: Some years ago there was a trial in Dublin, which, partly because the parties in the cause were in a well-to-do condition of life, and partly because the case in some measure involved the interests of the two conflicting Churches, excited considerable sensation and much comment.
Lever, Charles James, 1806-1872; Cooke, W. Cubitt (William Cubitt), 1866-1951 [Illustrator]
